Talk_01_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Ease_00>Whaaa? I can't quite believe it.<sp:5:1:0> That's
what has become of Koltin?<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Hmm...<snd:Ease_01> Thank you kindly for letting me
know.<sp:5:1:0> The end result was...well...I'm sure
he's very happy.
I think I'll take the stall my little brother
left behind to his favorite place.<sp:5:0:0> Yes,<sp:5:0:0> that
will be nice.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>And the handmade cloth my brother gave
you at the end...please make good use
of it. <sp:5:1:0>It's what he would have wanted.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>He always chased his dreams...<sp:5:1:0> So I will
also do my best to chase mine!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>Ah, hello, traveler. Hello. <sp:5:1:0>Can I help you
with something?
